shortcontents.shortcontent: I) Introduction (fols. 2ra-3vb; 4r-5v) - Letter of Eusebius to Carpianus (fol. 2ra-vb) - “Synopsis of Classes” (fols. 2vb-3vb) - Canon tables (fols. 4r-5v) II) Gospel of Matthew (fols. 3v; 6r-44rc) - List of the “tituli” for the Gospel of Matthew: 68 titles (fols. 3v, 6r-v) - Bǝsratä Matewos “Gospel of Matthew” (fols. 7ra-44rc) III) Gospel of Mark (fols. 44v-72ra) - List of the “tituli” for the Gospel of Mark: 48 titles (fols. 44v-45r) - Bǝsratä Marqos “Gospel of Mark” (fols. 46ra-72ra) IV) Gospel of Luke (fols. 72v-115rc) - List of the “tituli” for the Gospel of Luke: 93 titles (fols. 72v-74r) - Bǝsratä Luqas (fols. 75ra-115rb) - Short postscript (fol. 115rc) V) Gospel of John (fols. 115v-145rc) - List of the “tituli” for the Gospel of John: 18 titles (fol. 115v) - Bǝsratä Yoḥannǝs “Gospel of John” (fols. 116ra-145rc).

donors.donor: Rǝtuʿ ʾAmlak (mentioned in the supplication formulas on fols. 7r, 75r, 116r); Ker ʾƎgziʾ and Gädä Maryam (mentioned in the supplication formula on fol. 46r).

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with dark-brown tooled leather; textile inlays. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover (at least 5 tools were used: triple line fillet, criss-cross, double circle, cross-hatching, sine wave with dots).

bnothers.bnother: Two pairs of chains of endband stitches at the spine cover, one close to the head and one close to the tail of the codex.

squires.squire: I(fols. 1r-6v) – II(fols. 7r-14v) – III(fols. 15r-22v) – IV(fols. 23r-30v) – V(fols. 31r-38v) – VI(fols. 39r-45v) – VII(fols. 46r-53v) – VIII(fols. 53r-60v) – IX(fols. 61r-68v) – X(fols. 69r-74v) – XI(fols. 75r-83v) – XII(fols. 84r-93v) – XIII(fols. 94r-102v) – XIV(fols. 103r-110v) – XV(fols. 111r-115v) – XVI(fols. 116r-123v) – XVII(fols. 124r-132v) – XVIII(fols. 133r-140v) – XIX(fols. 141r-145v)

taunit.rl-info: Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are not visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling. The ruling pattern is different for the Canon tables.

margin.info: All data are for the second page of the first Gospel, recto side (fol. 8r).

rulings.ruling: Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are not visible. Ruling pricks are visible (s. fol. 114r). Structural pricks are not visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling. The ruling pattern is different for the Canon tables.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; incipits and headings of the texts (occasionally in alternating red and black lines); short postscript to the Gospel of Luke; the word mǝʿǝraf, numbers, x-shaped signs and incipits of the chapters; numbers of the “tituli”; some of the marginal notes indicating liturgical occasions on which a given section should be recited; elements of the punctuation signs; elements of the Ethiopic numerals; names of the donors; chi rho and coronis. On the incipit page of each Gospel, a few lines are rubricated (in groups of two lines, alternating with black lines).

otherdetails.otherdetail: - X-shaped (rubricated) sign with dashes above and below stands between the number of the chapter and its incipit (not quite regular, s., e. g., fols. 31r-v; 46v-47r, etc.). - Parts of the traditional introduction texts are missing. Concerning the traditional introduction texts s. R.W. COWLEY, "New Testament Introduction in the Andemta Commentary Tradition", Ostkirchliche Studien 26, 1977, 144-92 ; R. ZUURMOND, Novum Testamentum Aethiopice: the Synoptic Gospels, Part I: General Introduction, Part II: Edition of the Gospel of Mark, Stuttgart 1989 (AeF 27), 6-21. - The “tituli” for the Gospel of Matthew are not numbered, although their total number (66, incorrect) is written out at the end.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Notes in the upper margin written in a secondary hand, indicating liturgical occasions on which a given Gospel section should be recited: ዘልደት: fol. 7v. ዘሰብአ፡ ሰገል: fol. 8r. ዘዮሐንስ: fol. 8v. ዘጽጌያት: fol. 12r. ዘሐዋርያት: fol. 15v. ዘደብረ፡ ታቦር: fol. 25v. ዘሆሣዕና: fol. 29v. ዘደብረ፡ ዘይት: fol. 35r. ዘመላእክት: fol. 38r. ዘጸሎተ፡ ሐሙስ: fol. 39r. ዘጸሎተ፡ ሐሙስ: fol. 39v. ዘከመ፡ ከሕደ፡ ጴጥሮስ: fol. 41r. ዘነግህ፡ ዓርብ፡ ስቅለት: fol. 41v. ዘ፫ሰዓት: fol. 41v. ዘ፮ሰዓት: fol. 42r. ዘ፱ሰዓት: fol. 42v. ዘዕርበተ፡ ፀሐይ: fol. 43r. ዘትንሣኤ: fol. 43v. ዘሐዋርያት: fol. 49r. ዘደብረ፡ ታቦር: fol. 56v. ዘሆሣዕና: fol. 62r. ዘደብር፡ ዘይት: fol. 65v. ዘጸሎተ፡ ሐሙስ: fol. 67r. ዘነግሕ: fol. 69r. ዘ፫ሰዓት: fol. 69v. ዘ፮ሰዓት: fol. 69v. ዘ፱ሰዓት: fol. 70r. ዘሠርክ: fol. 70v. ዘትንሣኤ: fol. 71r. ዘጥምቀት: fol. 79v. ዘጻድቃን: fol. 84v. ዘሆሣዕና: fol. 107r. ዘደብረ፡ ዘይት: fol. 109r. ዘጸሎተ፡ ሐሙስ: fol. 110r. ዘትንሣኤ: fol. 113v. ዘቃና፡ ዘገሊላ: fol. 117v. ዘጸሎተ፡ ሐሙስ፡: fol. 135v. ዘርደተ፡ መንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ: fol. 138v. ዘግብረ፡ ዘወሀብከኒ: fol. 139v. ዘትንሣኤ: fol. 143v. - A white thread is inserted in the upper right corner of folio 25r.
